comments: A bisection of A016742. Sequence arises from reading the line from 0, in the direction 0, 16,... in the square spiral whose vertices are the squares A000290. - _Omar E. Pol_, May 24 2008Also, sequence found by reading the line from 0, in the direction 0, 16,... in the square spiral whose vertices are the generalized decagonal numbers A074377. - _Omar E. Pol_, Sep 10 2011
